name: Lake Madeleine
description:
Fish, memory.

  • Left click to cast a line. Wait for the fish and then reel using DOWN on your keyboard (right-click on PC/OSX). If the line disappears, cast it again.
  • Hit space to advance/restart if the line gets stuck completely (it can if you cast too close to the boat).

This was for a jam (#nar8) about narrative, but I'm not very good at plot. There are suggestions of a story here to be pieced together, but it's more fun (and like actual memory) to fill in the blanks for yourself based on what you fish up.

You can keep the character fishing every year forever if you want to see every line, though it may take awhile.

Comments + concerns + questions --> @keanerie
